title: Louisiana Sky
description: While Bentley Daniels was busy keeping secrets for Annabeth Richards, he missed all of the signs that Roxy Hart threw his way. Convinced that heâ€™d only ever see her in one light, Roxy had long since given up hope. But when he showed up on her doorstep one day, sparks flew. The only problem was, Bentley had a few secrets of his own. And the more that Roxy uncovered, the more Bentley started to push her away. When he finally pushed too far, it left a devastating rift between them. Now whenever they cross paths, Roxy looks the other way. But when the town and the universe conspire to throw them together at every possible opportunity, can Bentley get his shot at redemption?
author: Ashleigh Z.
